mapper.select: SELECT checklist_id AS checklistId, title FROM Checklist WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT ci.checklistitem_id AS checklistItemId, ci.keyword, ci.is_active AS isActive, ci.is_checked AS isChecked, ci.type, ci.checklist_id AS checklistId FROM ChecklistItem ci JOIN Checklist c ON c.checklist_id = ci.checklist_id WHERE ci.checklist_id = #{checklistId} AND c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ci.checklistitem_id ASC
